players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso and he killed Bob last night. Trust me."
Bob: "I'm not the mafioso. I believe Diana's claim that Charlie was the mafioso and he killed me last night."
Diana: "I agree with Bob. Charlie is the mafioso and he killed Bob last night. I, as the detective, have investigated this and found no other suspects."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
